languages.text: С падением своего нечестивого покровителя, Предела рассвета, погиб и культ Последнего восхода. Чистки уничтожили все ячейки секты, и не было оснований верить в сплетни, будто некоторым почитателям Губительных сил удалось скрыться, унося под полами рабочих роб писания своего изгнанного в варп владыки.
languages.translation_comment:
замочили на Ефрате Предела Рассвета, не делая реинфорс хаоса
или игрок поклонился Ктану

languages.text: With the fall of their unholy patron, the Edge of Daybreak, the Cult of the Final Dawn perished as well. Every cell of the cult was hunted down and eliminated. Rumours that some worshippers of the Ruinous Powers had managed to get away, hiding the writings of their warp-banished lord under their robes, were baseless.
languages.original_text: С падением своего нечестивого покровителя, Предела рассвета, погиб и культ Последнего восхода. Чистки уничтожили все ячейки секты, и не было оснований верить в сплетни, будто некоторым почитателям Губительных сил удалось скрыться, унося под полами рабочих роб писания своего изгнанного в варп владыки.

traits.locale_text: With the fall of their unholy patron, Edge of Daybreak, the Cult of the Final Dawn perished as well. All the cells of the cult were raided and eliminated. The rumour that some of the Ruinous Powers' worshipers managed to get away, hiding under their work robes the writings of their warp-banished lord, was unfounded and did not deserve to be trusted.

With the fall of their unholy patron, Edge of Daybreak, the Cult of the Final Dawn perished as well. All the cells of the cult were raided and eliminated. The rumour that some of the Ruinous Powers' worshipers managed to get away, hiding under their work robes the writings of their warp-banished lord, was unfounded and did not deserve to be trusted.

With the fall of their unholy patron, the Edge of Daybreak, the Cult of the Final Dawn perished as well. Every cell of the cult was hunted down and eliminated. Rumours that some worshipers of the Ruinous Powers had managed to get away, hiding the writings of their warp-banished lord under their robes, were baseless and unfounded.

With the fall of their unholy patron, the Edge of Daybreak, the Cult of the Final Dawn perished as well. Every cell of the cult was hunted down and eliminated. Rumours that some worshipers of the Ruinous Powers had managed to get away, hiding the writings of their warp-banished lord under their robes, were baseless and unfounded.

With the fall of their unholy patron, the Edge of Daybreak, the Cult of the Final Dawn perished as well. Every cell of the cult was hunted down and eliminated. Rumours that some worshippers of the Ruinous Powers had managed to get away, hiding the writings of their warp-banished lord under their robes, were baseless.

With the fall of their unholy patron, the Edge of Daybreak, the Cult of the Final Dawn perished as well. Every cell of the cult was hunted down and eliminated. Rumours that some worshippers of the Ruinous Powers had managed to get away, hiding the writings of their warp-banished lord under their robes, were baseless.

languages.text: 随着邪恶的庇护者“破晓锋刃”的陨落，终末黎明邪教也随之灭亡。所有分支成员都遭到追捕，最终被全部消灭。不过，仍有谣言声称，一部分毁灭之力的信徒逃脱了追捕，还将他们亚空间主人的著作藏在了长袍下面。不过，这样的谣言毫无根据。
languages.original_text: With the fall of their unholy patron, the Edge of Daybreak, the Cult of the Final Dawn perished as well. Every cell of the cult was hunted down and eliminated. Rumours that some worshippers of the Ruinous Powers had managed to get away, hiding the writings of their warp-banished lord under their robes, were baseless.

traits.locale_text: 随着邪恶的庇护者“破晓锋刃”的陨落，终末黎明邪教也随之灭亡。所有分支成员都遭到追捕，最终被全部消灭。不过，仍有谣言声称，一部分毁灭之力的信徒逃脱了追捕，还将他们亚空间主人的著作藏在了长袍下面。不过，这样的谣言毫无根据。

languages.text: Nach dem Fall seines unheiligen Schutzpatrons, des Rands des Tagesanbruchs, ging auch der Kult der letzten Dämmerung unter. Jede Zelle des Kults wurde gejagt und eliminiert. Gerüchte, dass einige Anhänger der Mächte der Zerstörung hatten entkommen können, die Schriften ihres in den Warp verbannten Lords unter ihren Roben versteckt, waren haltlos.
languages.original_text: With the fall of their unholy patron, the Edge of Daybreak, the Cult of the Final Dawn perished as well. Every cell of the cult was hunted down and eliminated. Rumours that some worshippers of the Ruinous Powers had managed to get away, hiding the writings of their warp-banished lord under their robes, were baseless.

traits.locale_text: Nach dem Fall seines unheiligen Schutzpatrons, des Rands des Tagesanbruchs, ging auch der Kult der letzten Dämmerung unter. Jede Zelle des Kults wurde gejagt und eliminiert. Gerüchte, dass einige Anhänger der Mächte der Zerstörung hatten entkommen können, die Schriften ihres in den Warp verbannten Lords unter ihren Roben versteckt, waren haltlos und unbegründet.

languages.text: Avec la chute de la Lame de l'Aube, son protecteur impie, le Culte de l'Aube finale disparut également. Toutes ses cellules furent traquées et éliminées. Le bruit courut que certains fidèles des Puissances de la Ruine avaient réussi à s'échapper en cachant les écrits de leur seigneur banni sous leurs robes, mais ces rumeurs se révélèrent sans fondement.
languages.original_text: With the fall of their unholy patron, the Edge of Daybreak, the Cult of the Final Dawn perished as well. Every cell of the cult was hunted down and eliminated. Rumours that some worshippers of the Ruinous Powers had managed to get away, hiding the writings of their warp-banished lord under their robes, were baseless.

traits.locale_text: Avec la chute de la Lame de l'Aube, son protecteur impie, le Culte de l'Aube finale disparut également. Toutes ses cellules furent traquées et éliminées. Le bruit courut que certains fidèles des Puissances de la Ruine avaient réussi à s'échapper en cachant les écrits de leur seigneur banni sous leurs robes, mais ces rumeurs se révélèrent sans fondement.

languages.text: Con la caída de su patrón profano, el Filo del Amanecer, el Culto del Amanecer Final también desapareció. Todas las células del culto fueron localizadas y eliminadas. Los rumores de que algunos de los adoradores de los Poderes Ruinosos habían escapado, ocultando bajo sus túnicas las escrituras de sus señores disformes, no tenían ningún fundamento.
languages.original_text: With the fall of their unholy patron, the Edge of Daybreak, the Cult of the Final Dawn perished as well. Every cell of the cult was hunted down and eliminated. Rumours that some worshippers of the Ruinous Powers had managed to get away, hiding the writings of their warp-banished lord under their robes, were baseless.

traits.locale_text: Con la caída de su patrón profano, el Filo del Amanecer, el Culto del Amanecer Final también desapareció. Todas las células del culto fueron localizadas y eliminadas. Los rumores de que algunos de los adoradores de los Poderes Ruinosos habían escapado, ocultando bajo sus túnicas las escrituras de sus señores disformes, no tenían ningún fundamento.

languages.text: 不浄の守護者である暁の刃が倒れ、最後の夜明け教団も消滅した。教団の支部はすべて狩り尽くされ、抹殺された。禍つ神々を崇拝する者たちが歪みの追放を受けた主君の書物を衣の下に隠して逃走したという噂は根拠のないものだった。
languages.original_text: With the fall of their unholy patron, the Edge of Daybreak, the Cult of the Final Dawn perished as well. Every cell of the cult was hunted down and eliminated. Rumours that some worshippers of the Ruinous Powers had managed to get away, hiding the writings of their warp-banished lord under their robes, were baseless.

traits.locale_text: 不浄の守護者である暁の刃が倒れ、最後の夜明け教団も消滅した。教団の支部はすべて狩り尽くされ、抹殺された。禍つ神々を崇拝する者たちが歪みの追放を受けた主君の書物を衣の下に隠して逃走したという噂は根拠のないものだった。

languages.text: Dinsiz hamisi Tan Vakti'nin düşüşüyle beraber Nihai Şafak Tarikatı da yok oldu. Tarikatın her bir hücresi aranıp bulundu ve ortadan kaldırıldı. Yıkıcı Güçler'e tapınan bazı kişilerin kaçmayı başardığına, öteboyuta sürülen efendilerinin yazıtlarını cübbelerinin altında sakladıklarına dair söylentiler ise tamamen asılsız çıktı.
languages.original_text: With the fall of their unholy patron, the Edge of Daybreak, the Cult of the Final Dawn perished as well. Every cell of the cult was hunted down and eliminated. Rumours that some worshippers of the Ruinous Powers had managed to get away, hiding the writings of their warp-banished lord under their robes, were baseless.

traits.locale_text: Dinsiz hamisi Tan Vakti'nin düşüşüyle beraber Nihai Şafak Tarikatı da yok oldu. Tarikatın her bir hücresi aranıp bulundu ve ortadan kaldırıldı. Yıkıcı Güçlere tapınan bazı kişilerin kaçmayı başardığına, öteboyuta sürülen efendilerinin yazıtlarını cübbelerinin altında sakladıklarına dair söylentiler ise tamamen asılsızdı.

languages.translation_comment:
замочили на Ефрате Предела Рассвета, не делая реинфорс хаоса
или игрок поклонился Ктану
